channel.title: Probably wrong section
channel.description:
As i said in my title, i couldn't find a section for this issue:
I'm trying to make a point system based on casted votes.
Example:
I go to vote for my server and this means I will get one point for doing that. I have now one point that i can spend on an item in-game.
Is this even possible? I know it is possible in a mysql based site, I'm using a free domain(forumotion) is it possible to do that.
I couldn't find any tutorials or anyone able to help me do this. I don't necessary want the points go on the game, the site would be fine.
I'm new to mysql so any help is appreciated.

item.title: Probably wrong section

@daved wrote:

i’ve never used it in my life, that’s why i’m looking for help.

Read full topic
